languages.text: Whenever the character uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}, each daemon and xenos in a 5-cell radius suffers {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
languages.original_text: Все противники в {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}области действия{/g} Боевого гимна или Яростного выступления получают +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожности{/g}. Противники на соседних клетках с поборником веры вместо этого получают +2 уровня тревожности. Демоны в области действия эффекта получают {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, равный {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментуму{/g}, который накапливает поборник веры при применении этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the character uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}, each daemon and xenos in a 5-cell radius suffers {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

Whenever the character uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}, each daemon and xenos in a 5-cell radius suffers {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

All enemies in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of War Hymn or Furious Recital gain +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effect. Enemies that are adjacent to the devotee gain +2 stacks of disturbed instead. Also, all daemons in the area of effect suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} restored to the devotee while using this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

All enemies in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of War Hymn or Furious Recital gain +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effect. Enemies that are adjacent to the devotee gain +2 stacks of disturbed instead. Also, all daemons in the area of effect suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} restored to the devotee while using this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

Whenever the character uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}, each daemon and xenos in a 5-cell radius suffers {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

languages.text: Setzt der Charakter {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Kriegshymne{/g} oder {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Inbrünstige Rezitation{/g} ein, erleiden alle Dämonen und Xenos in einem Radius von 5 Feldern {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direkten Schaden{/g} und werden mit +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Verblüfft{/g} belegt.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}, each daemon and xenos in a 5-cell radius suffers {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Setzt der Charakter {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Kriegshymne{/g} oder {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Inbrünstige Rezitation{/g} ein, erleiden alle Dämonen und Xenos in einem Radius von 5 Feldern {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direkten Schaden{/g} und werden mit +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Verblüfft{/g} belegt.

languages.text: Lorsque le personnage utilise {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Hymne de guerre{/g} ou {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Récital furieux{/g}, tous les démons et xénos dans un rayon de 5 cases subissent {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} et reçoivent +1 cumul de {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}, each daemon and xenos in a 5-cell radius suffers {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le personnage utilise {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Hymne de guerre{/g} ou {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Récital furieux{/g}, tous les démons et xénos dans un rayon de 5 cases subissent {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} et reçoivent +1 cumul de {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}.

languages.text: 每当此角色使用{g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}战争礼赞{/g}或{g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}愤怒颂歌{/g}时，距离5格内的所有恶魔与异形都会受到{uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf}点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}，同时获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果。
languages.original_text: Whenever the character uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}, each daemon and xenos in a 5-cell radius suffers {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当此角色使用{g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}战争礼赞{/g}或{g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}愤怒颂歌{/g}时，距离5格内的所有恶魔与异形都会受到{uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf}点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}，同时获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果。

languages.text: Cada vez que el personaje usa {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Himno de guerra{/g} o {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Recital furioso{/g}, todos los daemons y xenos en un radio de 5 casillas sufren {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} y +1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}, each daemon and xenos in a 5-cell radius suffers {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el personaje usa {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Himno de guerra{/g} o {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Recital furioso{/g}, todos los daemons y xenos en un radio de 5 casillas sufren {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} y +1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}.

Todos los enemigos en el {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}área de efecto{/g} de Himno de guerra o Recital furioso sufren +1 acumulación del efecto {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g}. Los enemigos adyacentes al devoto reciben +2 acumulaciones. Además, todos los daemons en el área de efecto sufren {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} igual al {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} que recupera el devoto al usar esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g}.

languages.text: キャラクターが{g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}戦の聖歌{/g}または{g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}怒りのリサイタル{/g}を使用するたび、5セル以内のすべてのデーモンとゼノは{uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf}{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を受け、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}を+1スタックを受ける。
languages.original_text: Whenever the character uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}, each daemon and xenos in a 5-cell radius suffers {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 怒りのリサイタルの{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲内{/g}にいるすべての敵は、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}効果を1スタック得る。信者に隣接している敵は、代わりに2スタックの動揺を得る。 さらに、この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用している間、範囲内のすべてのディーモンは信者が回復した{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: Когда священник Адептус Министорум использует {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Боевой гимн{/g} или {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Яростное выступление{/g}, каждый демон или ксенос в радиусе 5 клеток получает {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} и +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}, each daemon and xenos in a 5-cell radius suffers {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда священник Адептус Министорум использует {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Боевой гимн{/g} или{g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Яростное выступление{/g}, каждый демон или ксенос в радиусе 5 клеток получает {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} и 1 уровень эффекта {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательство{/g}.

Все противники в области действия Боевого гимна получают +1 уровень тревожности. Противники на соседних клетках со священником вместо этого получают +2 уровня тревожности. Демоны в области действия эффекта получают урон, равный моментуму, который накапливает священник при применении этой способности.

Когда священник Адептус Министорум использует {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Боевой гимн{/g} или{g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Яростное выступление{/g}, каждый демон или ксенос в радиусе 5 клеток получает {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} и 1 уровень эффекта {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательство{/g}.

Когда священник Адептус Министорум использует {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Боевой гимн{/g} или {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Яростное выступление{/g}, каждый демон или ксенос в радиусе 5 клеток получает {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} и +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g}.

languages.text: Karakter her {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Savaş İlahisi{/g} veya {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Hiddetli Resital{/g} kullandığında 5 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm iblis ve zenolar, {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasara{/g} ve +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}şaşkınlık{/g} birikimine maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}, each daemon and xenos in a 5-cell radius suffers {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Savaş İlahisi{/g} veya {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Hiddetli Resital{/g} kabiliyetlerinin {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}etki alanında{/g} bulunan tüm düşmanlar, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}kaygılı{/g} etkisi birikimi elde ederler. Zahidin bitişik hücresindeki düşmanlarda ise bu birikim +2'ye çıkar.
Ayrıca etki alanında bulunan tüm iblisler de zahidin bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} kullanırken ürettiği {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentuma{/g} eşit miktarda {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} maruz kalırlar.

Karakter her {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Savaş İlahisi{/g} veya {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Hiddetli Resital{/g} kullandığında 5 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm iblis ve zenolar, {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasara{/g} ve +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}şaşkınlık{/g} birikimine maruz kalır.

languages.text: Within the range of the 5 cell radius on bearer when use War Hymn and Furious Recital, all demons and xenos take direct damage equal to the current {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} value. In additional take +1 stack of the Perplexed.

traits.locale_text: Within the range of the 5 cell radius on bearer when use War Hymn and Furious Recital, all demons and xenos take direct damage equal to the current {uip|Damage|94b7a24311684783b34e0c53c41c58cf} value. In additional take +1 stack of the Perplexed.
